values.text: I didn't understand. You can try rephrasing.
Can you reword your statement? I'm not understanding.
I didn't get your meaning.

values: Please specify a number that is larger than 0

values.text: I can make a reservation for you. Just tell me the day and time of the reservation, and how many people it is for.

values: You seem to be having trouble choosing a time. I will make the reservation at 8PM for you.
Our last seating is at 9 PM.
Please specify the time that you want to eat. The restaurant seats people between 9AM and 9PM.
Alright. Let's start over. I'll try to keep up this time.
Ok, we'll stop there. No reservation will be made.
You cannot make a reservation for a day in the past.

values.text: I'm going to reserve you a table for $guests on $date at $time. Should I go ahead?

values: Respond with Yes to indicate that you want the reservation to be made as-is, or No to indicate that you do not.

values.text: What day would you like to come in?

values: How many people will be dining?
Ok. The reservation is for $guests guests
Ok, updating the number of guests from <? event.previous_value ?> to <? event.current_value ?>
What time do you want the reservation to be made for?
Our first seating is at 9 AM

values.text: The correct format for our order numbers is AAnnnnn. The A's represents 2 upper-case letters, and the n's represents 5 numbers. Do you have an order number with that format?
OK. See you later.
You can call us during business hours at (207)555-1234, send us email at foodies@example.com, or submit feedback through our website.
I am a chat bot that is designed to answer your questions about the Truck Stop Gourmand restaurant. What's your name?
If the pickup time is more than 48 hours from now, you can cancel your order.
Hello, <? @sys-person.literal ?>! It's lovely to meet you. How can I help you today?
What is the order number?
How can I help you today?

Truck Stop Gourmand is the brain child of Gloria and Fred Smith. What started out as a food truck in 2004 has expanded into a thriving restaurant. We now have one brick and mortar restaurant in downtown Portland. The bigger kitchen brought with it new chefs, but each one is faithful to the philosophy that made the Smith food truck so popular to begin with: deliver fresh, local produce in inventive and delicious ways. Join us for lunch or dinner seven days a week. Or order a cake from our bakery.
Ok. The order $ordernumber is canceled. We hope we get the opportunity to bake a cake for you sometime soon.
Good day to you!
In keeping with our commitment to giving you only fresh local ingredients, our menu changes daily to accommodate the produce we pick up in the morning. You can find today's menu on our website.

generic.title: Which menu do you want to see?

values.text: I need the order number to cancel the order for you. If you don't know the order number, please call us at 958-234-3456 to cancel over the phone.
Good day to you, $username!
To see our menu, go to the menu page on our website.
Just to confirm, you want to cancel order $ordernumber?
Ok. The order $ordernumber is canceled. We hope we get the opportunity to bake a cake for you sometime soon.
To see our vegetarian menu, go to the vegetarian menu page on our website.
Ok. The order $ordernumber is canceled. We hope we get the opportunity to bake a cake for you sometime soon.
I need the order number to cancel the order for you. If you don't know the order number, please call us at 958-234-3456 to cancel over the phone.
To see our cake shop menu, go to the cake shop menu page on our website.
OK. I am making you a reservation for $guests on $date at $time.
I look forward to helping you with your next reservation. Have a good day.
Welcome to the Watson Assistant tutorial!
